question.text: You are driving in a built-up area. You approach a speed hump. You should

explanation.text: Many towns have speed humps to slow down traffic. Slow down when driving over them. If you go too fast they may affect your steering and suspension, causing you to lose control or even damaging it. Be aware of pedestrians in these areas.

answer.text: move across to the left-hand side of the road
wait for any pedestrians to cross
